verses.verse: Now Jericho <S%H3405><s%> was tightly <S%H5462><s%> shut <S%H5462><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out and no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "See, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Jericho <S%H3405><s%> into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> with its king <S%H4428><s%> [and] the valiant <S%H2428><s%> warriors. <S%H1368><s%>

"And you shall march <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> circling <S%H5362><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once. <S%H259><s%> <S%H6471><s%> You shall do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3541><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"Also seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams' horns <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark; <S%H727><s%> then on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall march <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H7782><s%>

"And it shall be that when they make <S%H4900><s%> a long <S%H4900><s%> blast <S%H4900><s%> with the ram's horn, <S%H7161><s%> and when you hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall shout <S%H7321><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout; <S%H8643><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> flat, <S%H8478><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> will go <S%H5927><s%> up every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5048><s%> ahead. <S%H5048><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Take <S%H5375><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and let seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> carry <S%H5375><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams' horns <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Go <S%H5674><s%> forward, <S%H5674><s%> and march <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and let the armed <S%H9139><s%> men go <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And it was [so,] that when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had spoken <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams' horns <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> forward <S%H5674><s%> and blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets; <S%H7782><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

And the armed <S%H9139><s%> men went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> and the rear <S%H622><s%> guard <S%H622><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> while they continued <S%H1980><s%> to blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H7782><s%>

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not shout <S%H7321><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> let your voice <S%H6963><s%> be heard, <S%H8085><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> let a word <S%H1697><s%> proceed <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> I tell <S%H559><s%> you, 'Shout! <S%H7321><s%>' Then you shall shout! <S%H7321><s%>"

So he had the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> taken <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> circling <S%H5362><s%> [it] once <S%H259><s%>; <S%H6471><s%> then they came <S%H935><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%> and spent <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3885><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> trumpets <S%H7782><s%> of rams' horns <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on continually, <S%H1980><s%> and blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets; <S%H7782><s%> and the armed <S%H9139><s%> men went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and the rear <S%H622><s%> guard <S%H622><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> while they continued <S%H1980><s%> to blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H7782><s%>

Thus the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they marched <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once <S%H259><s%> <S%H6471><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp; <S%H4264><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3541><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that they rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> at the dawning <S%H7837><s%> of the day <S%H7837><s%> and marched <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> in the same <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times; <S%H6471><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> they marched <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times. <S%H6471><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the seventh <S%H7637><s%> time, <S%H6471><s%> when the priests <S%H3548><s%> blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Shout! <S%H7321><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the city. <S%H5892><s%>

"And the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be under <S%H9172><s%> the ban, <S%H9172><s%> it and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it belongs to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> Rahab <S%H7343><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with her in the house <S%H1004><s%> shall live, <S%H2421><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> she hid <S%H2244><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> we sent. <S%H7971><s%>

"But as for you, only <S%H7534><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> yourselves from the things <S%H9172><s%> under <S%H9172><s%> the ban, <S%H9172><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you covet <S%H2763><s%> [them] and take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the things <S%H9172><s%> under <S%H9172><s%> the ban, <S%H9172><s%> so you would make <S%H7760><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> accursed <S%H9172><s%> and bring <S%H5916><s%> trouble <S%H5916><s%> on it.

"But all <S%H3605><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%> and articles <S%H3627><s%> of bronze <S%H5178><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%> are holy <S%H6944><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> they shall go <S%H935><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

So the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted, <S%H7321><s%> and [priests] blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets; <S%H7782><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout <S%H8643><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> flat, <S%H8478><s%> so that the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up into the city, <S%H5892><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5048><s%> ahead, <S%H5048><s%> and they took <S%H3920><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And they utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> both <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5704><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> young <S%H5288><s%> and old, <S%H2205><s%> and ox <S%H7794><s%> and sheep <S%H7716><s%> and donkey, <S%H2543><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who had spied <S%H7270><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> into the harlot's house <S%H1004><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> she has out of there, <S%H8033><s%> as you have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to her."

So the young <S%H5288><s%> men <S%H5288><s%> who were spies <S%H7270><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in and brought <S%H3318><s%> out Rahab <S%H7343><s%> and her father and her mother <S%H1><s%> and her brothers <S%H517><s%> and all <S%H251><s%> she had; they also brought <S%H3605><s%> out all <S%H3318><s%> her relatives, <S%H3605><s%> and placed <S%H4940><s%> them outside <S%H5117><s%> <S%H4480><s%> the camp <S%H2351><s%> of Israel. <S%H4264><s%>

And they burned <S%H8313><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that was in it. Only <S%H7534><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%> and articles <S%H3627><s%> of bronze <S%H5178><s%> and iron, <S%H1270><s%> they put <S%H5414><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

However, Rahab <S%H7343><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> and her father's household <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> she had, Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spared; <S%H2421><s%> and she has lived <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> for she hid <S%H2244><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> out Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made them take <S%H7650><s%> an oath <S%H7650><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> rises <S%H6965><s%> up and builds <S%H1129><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> Jericho; <S%H3405><s%> with [the loss of] his first-born he shall lay <S%H3245><s%> its foundation, <S%H3245><s%> and with [the loss of] his youngest <S%H6810><s%> son <S%H6810><s%> he shall set <S%H5324><s%> up its gates. <S%H1817><s%>"
So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and his fame <S%H8089><s%> was in all <S%H3605><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
